## Goal (1 sentence)

What is the outcome?

## Context (2-3 lines)

Why are we doing this? Link relevant docs/issues/PRs with the character `#` or `@` for people. Add any relevant background info.

## Scope (what you will change)

- Files/folders likely touched:
  - `path/to/file`
  - `path/to/file`

## Definition of Done (checklist)

- [ ] Code builds (or docs render)
- [ ] Tests/Sim run (or N/A)
- [ ] Docs updated if behavior changed
- [ ] PR links this issue with `Fixes #<id>`

## Evidence (required)

Paste one:

- Command(s) run + short output snippet
- For RTL: brief note of what testbench / sim was used
